attributes.action: Pakistan is a terrorist country — Voices of Youth
attributes.additional_details: In addition to the risk of natural disasters, the industry had also faced loss in Pakistan. The attack in Army Public School, Peshawar was one of the most deadliest attack in the history of Pakistan. Total martyrs were 141 in number in which 131 were students. The students were brutally killed in the attack,,
attributes.background: The word terrorism is defined as “the unofficial or unauthorized use of violence”. There are three perspectives of terrorism: terrorist’s, victim’s and public’s. Terrorists would gladly accept the view that “one man’s terrorist is another man’s freedom fighter”.

rejection.details:
It not clear what action you want the UK Government or Parliament to take. However  this is a similar petition to yours already open which you might want to sign. 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/168107
